meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Harris Julie Wolfson Jeff Gorham Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6069.

td.p: Scott Harris, a videographer and elementary school librarian from Las Vegas, Nevada
Julie Wolfson, a systems engineer from Littleton, Colorado
Jeff Gorham, an accountant from Richmond, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,001)

tr.td: SPOKEN IN SOUTH AMERICA
DESCRIBING THE FILM
FAITH IN AMERICA
GET OFF YOUR HIGH HORSE
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
THE "LONG" & "SHORT" OF IT
